lines.text:
[Putting his arm around her]
Do you know you really turn me on?

[Disinterested]
Since when?
Since now. I belong to 'The Now Generation.'

[First lines]
O holy virgin, thou who art in the glory of God, I beg thee to intercede...
Don't blow your cool, honey. Just find yourself another Daddy!
Anything else you wish?
There might be, if you were 80 years younger, you sexy thing.
O, doesn't that turn you on?
Honey, sometimes you're just not with it!
Hey, large idea! Let's call a half a dozen guys and have an orgy!
Sweetness, baby. Float with the tide, that's my bag. This is a pop art world, baby!
The Trip.
Does it swing?
Swing? It wails!
Who's your groovy friend?
Lisa, this is Johnny Allen.
Hey - you're too much.
Too much what?
Is this bird for real?
Sugar? In beer?
Get with it doll, haven't you ever heard of...
Jerry, shut up and drink your beer!

[Takes a drink of coffee]
Oh, this tastes like acid!
Hey, dig what the tide brought in.
How far are we flying?
Short trip, baby,
Oh, what's wrong with a roundtrip?
I'm gonna cube that mutha for good!
She's a drag doll, poison, the end, suicide.
What happened?
Who knows? Too much liquor? Maybe he freaked out.
Freaked out?
From acid. LSD. You take LSD and strange things begin to happen. You, eh, see sounds, you hear colors.
Look, eh, sir, Doctor, if I could have another chance?

To play God? To learn to twist the human mind where you should learn to heal it? To debase what you should uplift? To destroy what you should preserve? Too many doctors now who think more of their pleasures, than their practices. This world can get along very well without another one of that kind. Mr. Allen, you're expelled from this University.
How come you're not at school?
Eh, I'm thinkin' of droppin' out.
He'd just like to examine chicks. Typical, chick checker.
There are other things a guy can do?
Name six.
Marriage - to the right broad.
Dig this! Miss Goody-Two-Shoes sold your fish painting to old moneybags for 600 bucks!
I don't know about you, baby, but I'm ready to fly!
Johnny, come on! Come on and take shower with me. Come on, now, precious.
I don't need a shower.
Did I tell you? That's how her kind repays loyalty - with a shaft.
Oh, look, relax. Bibi's not mad at you. I'm not mad at Lalo. So, what the hell.
Lalo's wild, baby! You'll have a ball!
Hey, man, how 'bout the four of us makin' it together!
You are filthy! Disgusting!
Yeah, but, it's so much fun!
Oh, take it easy! I know what I want and what I don't want. And what I don't want is someone telling me how to live my life!
Get out of my house! All of you! Get out!
Man, I bet she even wears pajamas to bed!
Listen, sweetheart, you've got it all wrong. Our love is for real. Bibi's just a groovy chick, that's all.
Look, we're both hip people. Why let things end up in a bad way?
When I was in medical school, anatomy was one of my best subjects.
